name: Vanished (playvanished)
description:
'Vanished' is set in Old Hollywood in 1933. You play as Sienna Myers, a person who wishes above all else to be transported into 'Renee', a talkie film, to live in their dazzling world of parties and romance forever. 

A strange woman named Murmones offers to make your wish come true in an esoteric shop late at night. You are transported inside of 'Renee' after a shoddy and eerie invocation, only to be confronted with the terrible reality lurking under the gloss. How will you escape and evade the city's deadly dangers?
